name: The Big Fat Vore RPG version 0.2
name_original: The Big Fat Vore RPG version 0.2
description:
Happy Vore Day everyone! The next update to this if finally here!

There was a lot changed between this and the previous public update, so transferring old saves to this version won't work.

Unfortunately, I forgot to keep a changelog for all the stuff added and changed, so I can't quite list out all the changes, but here's the major stuff:

-The rest of the second floor has been fleshed out, with several side areas.

-5 new party characters.

-Plenty of new NPCs to see get bigger.

-A fledgling fast travel system has been introduced.

That's all the major stuff. I hope you enjoy!
